contact: M. G. Henderson, S. K. Morley @ Los Alamos National Laboratory (LANL)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_dipole_tilt
parameters.description: Dipole tilt angle. Rotation angle (around Y-axis) between GSM and SM coordinate systems. In units of degrees.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_gmst
parameters.description: Greenwich Mean Sidereal Time (GMST).

parameters.name: mms4_mec_mlat
parameters.description: Magnetic Latitude.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_mlt
parameters.description: Magnetic Local Time.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_l_dipole
parameters.description: Dipole L-shell value.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_bcs
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to BCS (ECI to BCS). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_dbcs
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to DBCS (ECI to DBCS). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_dmpa
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to DMPA (ECI to DMPA). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_smpa
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to SMPA (ECI to SMPA). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_dsl
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to DSL (ECI to DSL). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_ssl
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to SSL (ECI to SSL). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_L_vec
parameters.description: Right ascension (deg) and declination (deg) of angular momentum (L)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_Z_vec
parameters.description: Right ascension (deg) and declination (deg) of Body Z-axis

parameters.name: mms4_mec_P_vec
parameters.description: Right ascension (deg) and declination (deg) of Major Principal Axis

parameters.name: mms4_mec_L_phase
parameters.description: L-phase (Sun-to-body-X dihedral angle about angular momentum vector L) (deg)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_Z_phase
parameters.description: Z-phase (Sun-to-body-X dihedral angle about the body-Z vector) (deg)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_P_phase
parameters.description: P-phase (Sun-to-body-X dihedral angle about the major principal axis, P) (deg)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_kp
parameters.description: Kp index from QinDenton files (used as input to magnetic field models)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_dst
parameters.description: Dst index from QinDenton files. Used as input to magnetic field models

parameters.name: mms4_mec_earth_eclipse_flag
parameters.description: Earth eclipse flag: 0 = no eclipse; 1 = penumbral eclipse; 2 = umbral eclipse.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_moon_eclipse_flag
parameters.description: Moon eclipse flag: 0 = no eclipse; 1 = penumbral eclipse; 2 = umbral eclipse.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_eci
parameters.description: Geocentric Equatorial Inertial (GEI/J2000) position vector of mms4 (km)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_v_eci
parameters.description: Velocity of mms4 spacecraft in GEI/J2000 (i.e. ECI) coordinates (km/s)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_gsm
parameters.description: Geocentric Solar Magnetospheric (GSM) position vector of mms4 (km)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_v_gsm
parameters.description: Velocity of mms4 spacecraft in GSM coordinates (km/s)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_gsm
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to GSM (ECI to GSM). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_geo
parameters.description: Geocentric Geographic (GEO) position vector of mms4 (km)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_v_geo
parameters.description: Velocity of mms4 spacecraft in GEO coordinates (km/s)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_geo
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to GEO (ECI to GEO). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_sm
parameters.description: Geocentric Solar Magnetic (SM) position vector of mms4 (km)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_v_sm
parameters.description: Velocity of mms4 spacecraft in SM coordinates (km/s)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_sm
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to SM (ECI to SM). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_gse
parameters.description: Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (GSE) position vector of mms4 (km)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_v_gse
parameters.description: Velocity of mms4 spacecraft in GSE coordinates (km/s)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_gse
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to GSE (ECI to GSE). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_gse2000
parameters.description: Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (J2000 Pole, GSE2000) position vector of mms4 (km)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_v_gse2000
parameters.description: Velocity of mms4 spacecraft in GSE2000 coordinates (km/s)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_quat_eci_to_gse2000
parameters.description: Quaternion rotation from GEI/J2000 to GSE2000 (ECI to GSE2000). ((qx,qy,qz), qw)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_geod_lat
parameters.description: Geodetic latitude of mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_geod_lon
parameters.description: Geodetic longitude of mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_geod_height
parameters.description: Geodetic height of mms4 spacecraft. (Height above WGS84 Spheroid.)

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_sun_de421_eci
parameters.description: Geocentric position vector (in km) of the Sun in GEI/J2000 Coordinates.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_r_moon_de421_eci
parameters.description: Geocentric position vector (in km) of the Moon in GEI/J2000 Coordinates.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_fieldline_type
parameters.description: Fieldline Type: 0 = IMF; 1 = Closed; 2 = Open Northern Lobe; 3 = Open Southern Lobe; -1 = Inside Earth; -2 = Target Height Unreachable; -3 = Bad Trace (error).

parameters.name: mms4_mec_bsc_gsm
parameters.description: Magnetic field (in GSM) at mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_loss_cone_angle_s
parameters.description: Southern loss cone angle. Degrees.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_loss_cone_angle_n
parameters.description: Northern loss cone angle. Degrees.

parameters.name: mms4_mec_pfs_geod_latlon
parameters.description: Geodetic latitude and longitude of southern footpoint (100km geodetic height) of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_pfn_geod_latlon
parameters.description: Geodetic latitude and longitude of northern footpoint (100km geodetic height) of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_pfs_gsm
parameters.description: GSM position southern footpoint (100km geodetic height) of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_bfs_gsm
parameters.description: Magnetic field (in GSM) at southern footpoint (100km geodetic height) of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_pfn_gsm
parameters.description: GSM position northern footpoint (100km geodetic height) of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_bfn_gsm
parameters.description: Magnetic field (in GSM) at northern footpoint (100km geodetic height) of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_pmin_gsm
parameters.description: GSM position of min-B point of field threading the mms4 spacecraft

parameters.name: mms4_mec_bmin_gsm
parameters.description: Magnetic field (in GSM) at min-B point of field threading the mms4 spacecraft
